title: American, United Project Packed Planes This Summer
sub_head: Heavy travel demand allowing airlines to raise fares and offset surging jet-fuel prices, executives say
body:
Airlines said they have reached a new juncture in their recovery from the Covid-19 pandemic, anticipating record revenue in the current quarter and a return to profits this year.
American Airlines Group Inc. said Thursday that its sales hit a record in March, the first month since the pandemic began in which the airlineâ€™s total revenue surpassed 2019 levels.
